name: Hexaya
description:
• Match three or more hexagons of the same color
• Play away enough cells, and you'll get some more
• Try to remove the fat ones first
• Every move creates new possibilities
• Bigger moves are not always better!

The minimalistic design helps you relax and concentrate on the hexagons

NO time pressure === NO move count === JUST relax

Download Hexaya now - it's free!
